title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.86 - Deductions from revenue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.86 - Deductions from revenue

State Regulations

Reductions in gross revenue arising from bad debts, contractual adjustments, uncompensated/charity care, administrative, courtesy, policy discounts, adjustments and others. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.86

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
